comments: Chemistry in general is quite difficult. That being said, she makes the time to give any student extra help as long as you make her aware you need it. Bottom line, it\'s a lot of homework but you keep up with YOUR homework, you earn your A. I thought Acken was a great professor and really wanted to help all her students. I\'d retake her

comments: I\'m not going to be rude. And we\'re all human. But she is the type of person to take her personal emotion and work on that rather than actually just being a teacher. She has no problem wasting 15 minutes on rambling about something that bothers her. Shes more of a mom than a professor. I wouldn\'t reccomend anyone to take her. Sorry.
